name: Fill and Cross. World Contest HD Free
name_original: Fill and Cross. World Contest HD Free
description:
Guess all the pictures and win the world contest!

Solve 120 unique puzzles in 6 elegant locations in the most prestigious casino.

This puzzle game's genre also known as griddlers, picross, hanjie, nonograms, japanese crosswords, logic puzzles, pic-a-pix, nonogramme, logimage, logic art, nonogrids, japanilainen ristikko, nonogramm, kare karalamaca, nonogramas, malovane krizovky, crucipixel.

More than 4 hours of gameplay, excellent music, magnificent trophies and full immersion in a truly world contest's atmosphere!
